column4: Hello, I have an ubuntu iso image on my netbook running Windows XP. How do I install Ubuntu next to windows xp?
They also make software that will allow you to shrink your xp partition
I mounted the iso and started wubi. It wants me to reboot. But this is just a mounted iso so it won't be visible to computer bios
If it wants you to reboot I imagine it knows what it's doing. I haven't installed using Wubi before.
it must be thinking the cd is in real CD-ROM drive?
That question is best not directed at me, as I said I've never installed with Wubi.
